pages.title: Bohemoharpes
pages.text: $(l)Temporal Range:$() Silurian-Devonian$(br2)$(l)Habitat:$() Ocean, Crinoid Garden, Devonian Marine$(br2)>Trilobita$(br)>Harpetida$(br)>Harpetidae

As the name suggests, Bohemoharpes is a Silurian trilobite from the Bohemia region, Czech Republic, and is closely related and similar to Harpes. Though, Bohemoharpes has a wider and rounder cephalon. The large and round head shield of harpetid trilobites make them instantly recognizable.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
